title.narrative: Scoping study to research barriers to unconventional gas development in China

description.narrative: This project is designed to scope the shape of activity under the Energy/Low Carbon pillar of the forthcoming China programme. It will ascertain whether UK expertise on environmental regulations and monitoring (e.g. water management plans, risk assessments of soil pollution, methane leakage) can support the sustainable development of China's unconventional gas industry. The forthcoming China programme will match China's specific reform needs with UK energy and low carbon strengths, reducing global emissions by accelerating China's energy transition. It will also aim to generate opportunities for international, including UK, business.
